data.title: Make Room! Make Room!: Harry Harrison
data.meta_description: 9780241507704 Publisher ‏ : ‎ Penguin Classics; 1st edition (June 3, 2021) 'Revelatory. Harry Harrison's novel about Earth on the edge of disaster is both bracing and cathartic ... impressively prescient' GuardianThe planet's population has exploded and resources are stretched to breaking point. Who we are

The Campus Bookshop - your select bookstore on the Wits East Campus. The Campus Bookshop offers a wide assortment of new and second-hand academic, technical, professional, educational and collectible books.
